Paragraph: However , the LUMO wave function shows a different degree of localization in the electron density dependent on the types of the electron - withdrawing units.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| LUMO wave function |
| electron density |
| electron - withdrawing units |

Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: However , the LUMO wave function shows a different degree of localization in the electron density dependent on the types of the electron - withdrawing units.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| LUMO wave function |
| electron density |
| types of the electron - withdrawing units |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

| --- |
| LUMO wave function |
| electron density |
| types of electron-withdrawing units (implicitly referring to material properties of the electron-withdrawing units) |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: However , the LUMO wave function shows a different degree of localization in the electron density dependent on the types of the electron - withdrawing units.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value               |
|-----------------------------|
| LUMO wave function          |
| electron density           |
| types of the electron - withdrawing units |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value               |
|-----------------------------|
| LUMO wave function          |
| electron density           |
| types of electron-withdrawing units |

Note: In the original paragraph, "degree of localization" is not a material property and was removed. The term "electron-withdrawing units" refers to a type of material property, specifically a functional group that can withdraw electrons from another molecule or atom.
